resources.string:
Exquisite corpse (from the original French term cadavre exquis, literally exquisite cadaver), "
" is a method by which a collection of words or images(in this app's case is words only) is collectively assembled. "
" You start by typing N words(changeable) in this options menu, and append them into a phrase in which it will be displayed in the final game. "
" You can also press the TTS(TextToSpeech) button in order to listen to an AI(Artificial Intelligence) speak the phrase that the players built. "
" In the options menu there are many adjustable settings, like the player order, number of rounds, etc. "
" Hope you enjoy the game!
